statements: SELECT * FROM Artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM Artists WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT artist_name, birth_date FROM Artists ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM Artists WHERE portfolio_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_artists FROM Artists;
SELECT artist_name, birth_date FROM Artists WHERE nationality = 'French';
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM Artists WHERE birth_date < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Artists ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT artist_name, birth_date, nationality FROM Artists WHERE nationality = 'American' ORDER BY birth_date ASC;
SELECT artist_name, nationality, birth_date FROM Artists WHERE portfolio_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists WHERE nationality='French';
SELECT artist_name, birth_date FROM artists ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sculptures WHERE material='Marble' AND creation_date>'2020-01-01';
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_id FROM sculptures ORDER BY sculpture_name;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists WHERE birth_date < '1980-01-01';
SELECT sculpture_name, material, creation_date FROM sculptures WHERE material LIKE '%bronze%';
SELECT artist_name, birth_date FROM artists ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT sculpt.sculpture_name, art.artist_name FROM sculptures AS sculpt INNER JOIN artists AS art ON sculpt.artist_id = art.artist_id;
SELECT artist_id, COUNT(*) AS num_sculptures FROM sculptures GROUP BY artist_id HAVING num_sculptures > 3;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, birth_date FROM artists ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists WHERE nationality='French';
SELECT work_name, creation_date FROM sculptural_works ORDER BY creation_date ASC;
SELECT artist_name, nationality, material_used FROM artists JOIN sculptural_works ON artists.artist_id = sculptural_works.artist_id;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists ORDER BY nationality DESC, artist_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT work_name, creation_date, material_used FROM sculptural_works WHERE work_id > 5 AND material_used = 'Marble';
SELECT artist_name, work_name, creation_date FROM artists JOIN sculptural_works ON artists.artist_id = sculptural_works.artist_id WHERE artists.nationality = 'Italian' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;

SELECT artist_name, work_name, year_created FROM artists JOIN artist_portfolio ON artists.artist_id = artist_portfolio.artist_id WHERE year_created BETWEEN 1900 AND 2000 ORDER BY year_created ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT artist_name, work_name FROM artists LEFT JOIN sculptural_works ON artists.artist_id = sculptural_works.artist_id WHERE year_created IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Artists;
SELECT sculpture_name, creation_date, material FROM Sculptures;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM Artists WHERE birthdate < '1980-01-01';
SELECT style_name FROM SculptureStyles WHERE style_id = 3;

SELECT artist_name, sculpture_name, creation_date, material, style_name FROM Artists JOIN Sculptures ON Artists.artist_id = Sculptures.artist_id JOIN SculptureStylesMapping ON Sculptures.sculpture_id = SculptureStylesMapping.sculpture_id JOIN SculptureStyles ON SculptureStylesMapping.style_id = SculptureStyles.style_id;
SELECT * FROM Artists;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM Artists WHERE nationality = 'French';
SELECT sculpture_name, material FROM Sculptures ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT Artists.artist_name, Sculptures.sculpture_name FROM Artists INNER JOIN Sculptures ON Artists.artist_id = Sculptures.artist_id;

SELECT Sculptures.sculpture_name, SculptureStyles.style_name FROM Sculptures INNER JOIN SculptureStylesMapping ON Sculptures.sculpture_id = SculptureStylesMapping.sculpture_id INNER JOIN SculptureStyles ON SculptureStylesMapping.style_id = SculptureStyles.style_id;
SELECT * FROM Artists;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM Artists WHERE birth_date >= '1980-01-01';
SELECT sculpture_name, material FROM Sculptures ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, birth_date, nationality FROM Artists ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, acquisition_date, artist_id FROM CollectionItems WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Artists WHERE nationality = 'French' ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, material, creation_date FROM Sculptures JOIN Artists ON Sculptures.artist_id = Artists.artist_id WHERE Artists.birth_date < '1960-01-01' ORDER BY creation_date ASC;

SELECT collection_name, year_established, gallery_name FROM ArtCollections JOIN Galleries ON ArtCollections.collection_id = Galleries.gallery_id WHERE year_established > '2000-01-01' ORDER BY collection_name;
SELECT artist_name, birth_date, nationality FROM Artists LEFT JOIN CollectionItems ON Artists.artist_id = CollectionItems.artist_id WHERE CollectionItems.collection_id IS NULL;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, nationality FROM Sculptures JOIN Artists ON Sculptures.artist_id = Artists.artist_id WHERE nationality <> 'Italian' ORDER BY sculpture_name DESC;
